tasks.message:
Hey! You're that new hotshot pilot!
They call you, er... I forgot.
Remind me again.

tasks.prompt: What's your name or call sign?

tasks.message:
Welcome aboard, <NAME>! Let's get you ready to go.
We've got incoming.
Looks like the SHROOMIANS sent a scout ahead. Prepare to engage!

Excellent work <NAME>!
Maybe you are everything they claim!
Here! Take this.
